verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The splendor of a King Clothed in majesty Let all the earth rejoice All the earth rejoice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He wraps Himself in light And darkness tries to hide It trembles at His voice Trembles at His voice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Age to age, He stands And time is in His hands Beginning and the end Beginning and the end{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Godhead Three in One Father, Spirit, Son Lion and the Lamb Lion and the Lamb{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(How great is our God, sing with me) Name above all names (How great is our God and all will see) Worthy of our praise (How great, how great is our God) My heart will sing How great is our God{/lang-eng}
